ER.name: Engineer Regulation (ER)
ER.description: Standard format for USACE Engineer Regulations — policy documents that prescribe mandatory actions

sections.title: 1. Purpose
sections.guidance: State the purpose of the regulation concisely.

sections.title: 2. Applicability
sections.guidance: Identify the USACE commands, staff elements, and organizations to which the regulation applies.

sections.title: 3. Distribution Statement
sections.guidance: Include the appropriate distribution statement per DoD Directive 5230.24.

sections.title: 4. References
sections.guidance: List all references in alphanumeric order by issuing agency.

sections.title: 5. Policy
sections.guidance: State the policy being prescribed. Use clear, directive language.

sections.title: 6. Responsibilities
sections.guidance: Assign responsibilities to specific organizational elements.

sections.title: 7. Procedures
sections.guidance: Detail the procedures required to implement the policy.

EP.name: Engineer Pamphlet (EP)
EP.description: Standard format for USACE Engineer Pamphlets — guidance documents that provide non-mandatory information

sections.title: Foreword
sections.guidance: Signed by the appropriate authority, typically a General Officer.

sections.title: Body Chapters
sections.guidance: Organize content into logically structured chapters. Use figures, tables, and appendices as needed.

sections.title: Appendices
sections.guidance: Include supplementary information, forms, checklists, or detailed procedures.

sections.title: Glossary
sections.guidance: Define terms and abbreviations used in the pamphlet.

ETL.name: Engineer Technical Letter (ETL)
ETL.description: Temporary technical guidance with a maximum 2-year lifespan. Used for urgent engineering guidance.

sections.title: 2. Guidance
sections.guidance: Provide the technical guidance. Be specific and actionable.

sections.title: 3. Point of Contact
sections.guidance: Name, office symbol, phone, and email of the technical POC.

ERDC-TR.name: ERDC Technical Report (TR)
ERDC-TR.description: Technical report format for the Engineer Research and Development Center

sections.title: Standard Form 298 (Report Documentation Page)
sections.guidance: See SF298 generator for this mandatory first page.

sections.title: Abstract
sections.guidance: Maximum 200 words. Summarize the purpose, approach, results, and significance.

sections.title: Preface
sections.guidance: Identify the study, sponsoring agency, and key personnel.

sections.title: Body Chapters
sections.guidance: Present methodology, data, analysis, and results.

sections.title: References
sections.guidance: Use the ERDC citation style (modified Chicago).
